err.UnableToTranslate.en: Could not translate text. The reason is

msg.formTranslate.TextHint.en: Enter text in any language to be translated

msg.Help.en:
Hey {{user}} I am here to help. You can now translate text easily in one of three ways:
• Use the `/translate` command. The syntax is `/translate [lang] [text]` Where [lang] is equal to a language code such as `de`, `vi`, `ja`, `es`. <https://github.com/siquylee/slack-translator/wiki|Click here> to see the full list of language codes. The source text doesn't have to be English, the app will attempt to auto-detect the source language. There is a 2000 character limit per command.• Or use `Translate` action from the actions menu for any Slack messages
• Or enter `/translate` and the app shows a dialog with fields to select target language and enter your text.
